title: The Collected Ender's Game (Marvel) (2008-2011) (DCP)
description:
Contains (ought to be complete as far as Marvel publications are concerned):

ENDER'S GAME - The original story by Orson Scott Card, adapted by Marvel as two five-issue mini-series subtitled "Battle School" and "Command School". All compiled into one pseudo-TPB, from original releases by Steam-DCP.

ENDER'S SHADOW - A "sidequel" story, adapted and compiled analogously.

MAZER IN PRISON - Standalone prequel issue. Original release by Steam-DCP.
WAR OF GIFTS - Standalone sidequel issue, adapted from a short story. Ditto.

RECRUITING VALENTINE & THE LEAGUE WAR - Two more standalone issues, featuring Ender's siblings, and serving as secondary prequels to the sequels to both "Ender's Game" and "Ender's Shadow"... talk about tangled continuity, huh?!

ENDER IN EXILE - The immediate sequel to "Ender's Game". Five-issue series compiled into one, from releases by theAntagonist-DCP.

SPEAKER FOR THE DEAD - A sequel set in the distant future of "Ender's Game". Five-issue series compiled into one, from releases by theProletariat-DCP.

FORMIC WARS - The principal prequel to "Ender's Game", published as two mini-series subtitled "Burning Earth" and "Silent Strike" with a total of twelve issues. Again all compiled into one, and again from releases by theProletariat-DCP.
